entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
